hero.title: Yorick te Riele
hero.subtitle: Software Engineering Student
hero.description: I'm passionate about learning, coding, and building meaningful digital experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm Yorick, a curious and driven student in Software Engineering based in Zwolle. I love solving problems with code and turning ideas into working software.
about.paragraph2: Learning new things and applying them in real-world projects motivates me. Whether itâ€™s frontend or backend, I enjoy building solid, user-focused solutions and working in teams using methods like Scrum.
about.paragraph3: Outside of my studies, I work on freelance web projects and keep exploring new tech. I aim to grow every day and contribute with dedication and creativity.

items.title: Bachelor of Software Engineering
items.description: Studying software engineering, focusing on both frontend and backend development, teamwork, and modern methodologies.

items.title: Software Engineer Intern
items.description: Developed a generic web editor for microservices architecture, contributing to software development tasks and learning professional workflows in a team setting.

items.title: IT Support
items.description: Helped people at home with tech-related issues and learned to communicate technical solutions clearly.

items.title: Web Designer
items.description: Designed and maintained the website of a local business with a focus on usability and design.

items.title: Superelf Football Pool
items.description: A web application where users can create pools, invite friends, and compete by selecting 15 unique Eredivisie clubs to score points based on player performances. Features include user authentication, real-time score updates, and a responsive interface.

items.title: Procedural Cave Generator
items.description: A Unity project featuring procedurally generated caves using Voronoi noise and cellular automata. This project explores procedural generation techniques to create unique and interesting cave systems with smooth transitions between different terrain types.

items.title: Portfolio Website
items.description: This website! Built with modern frameworks to present my skills, experience, and projects.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: Reach Out
contact.description: Interested in collaborating or want to get in touch? I'd love to hear from you!

items.description: Een webapplicatie waar gebruikers pools kunnen aanmaken, vrienden kunnen uitnodigen en kunnen strijden door 15 unieke Eredivisie clubs te selecteren om punten te scoren op basis van spelersprestaties. Met gebruikersauthenticatie, real-time score updates en een responsieve interface.
